attributes.action: No to Building Plans for Great Lines Gillingham
attributes.additional_details:
Medway Council have submitted 4 planning applications to build on the Great Lines Park.
Planning References: MC/11/2653, MC/11/2274, MC/11/1218, MC/11/2655.
This is a National Heritage site, in a Conservation Area. We must not lose these fields, used daily by many local families.
The local community do not feel we were properly informed as we were completely unaware such plans had been submitted and therefore unable to object appropriately.
